def_cn: (指代先前提及的人或物)这，这个
def_en: You use this to refer back to a particular person or thing that has been mentioned or implied.

def_cn: (引出将要谈论的人或物)下面(这个)，以下
def_en: You use this to introduce someone or something that you are going to talk about.

def_cn: 这一点(指前一句或几句话中提到的观点或情况)
def_en: You use this to refer back to an idea or situation expressed in a previous sentence or sentences.

def_cn: (叙述时引出新出现的人或物)这个，一个
def_en: In spoken English, people use this to introduce a person or thing into a story.

def_cn: 这个，这位(尤指所触碰或指向的离自己较近的人或物，有两个以上时，用于指最近的一个)
def_en: You use this to refer to a person or thing that is near you, especially when you touch them or point to them. When there are two or more people or things near you, this refers to the nearest one.

def_cn: 这个，这(指代正在发生或刚刚发生的与自己有关的一般情况、活动或事件)
def_en: You use this when you refer to a general situation, activity, or event which is happening or has just happened and which you feel involved in.

def_cn: 这，该，此(指当前所处地点或时间)
def_en: You use this when you refer to the place you are in now or to the present time.

def_cn: 本，今，这个，下一个(指接下来将要发生某事的特定时间)
def_en: You use this to refer to the next occurrence in the future of a particular day, month, season, or festival.

def_cn: 这么，这样(用于用手比划大小、形状时)
def_en: You use this when you are indicating the size or shape of something with your hands.

def_cn: 这么，这样(用于说明自己知道或能告知的内容)
def_en: You use this when you are going to specify how much you know or how much you can tell someone.
If you say this is it, you are agreeing with what someone else has just said.

def_cn: (用于电话、广播或电视中，表明身份或所代表的机构)我是，这里是
def_en: You use this in order to say who you are or what organization you are representing, when you are speaking on the telephone, radio, or television.

def_cn: 这个(指说话、写作时的媒介)
def_en: You use this to refer to the medium of communication that you are using at the time of speaking or writing.

def_cn: 各种各样的东西;这样那样
def_en: If you say that you are doing or talking about this and that, or this, that, and the other you mean that you are doing or talking about a variety of things that you do not want to specify.
